about.0: How to become a partner at TronGMC?
about.1: To become a partner of our company, you need to rent one of the packages we offer. So you support Tron Blockchain and become a partner of our company.
about.2: What should happen after registering with the company?
about.3: After registering with our company, you must be a member of the VIP packages we offer. When a member is found, machines are rented, earnings are protected online and reflected in your balance.
about.4: Rented machines work according to the amount you pay and profit is provided.
about.5: I want to withdraw money from my account, how can I do it?
about.6: Go to the Accounts section and run the "Withdrawal" section. and enter the trx address. Enter the limits you want to shoot and shoot.
about.7: The minimum withdrawal deposit is 10 trx, the minimum savings deposit is 20 trx.
about.8: You can withdraw money only once a day. Withdrawal and investment hours are 08:00 and 20:00. (Swedish time)
about.9: Which deposit units can he invest in?
about.10: TRX (TRC20) only. Because we have an agreement with Tron company and we only accept tron. This is because to support Tron Blockchain and build volume on Tron.
about.11: What is the level of VIP packages?
about.12: Each VIP package has different devices and different hash rate. By purchasing VIP1, you are renting your minimum power consumption. and increases the weak hashrate size by 7% per day. However, by purchasing VIP 5 you get a higher interest rate, which is fair.
about.13: I have withdrawn money but it hasn't come yet, why?
about.14: There may be delays in the withdrawal time. The reason for this is that it is registered with a company owned by more people. If you have such a letter, please send a text message to our support line.
about.15: Only TRX is used for withdrawals.
about.16: Your transactions are recorded and you can see them.
about.17: How can I find out or change my password if I forgot it?
about.18: If you want to change the password, you can update the password by using "Change password"in the accounts section and typing the previous password and re-entering the new password and new password.
about.19: How is money deposited into the account?
about.20: If you want to add funds to your account, go to "profile" and tap on deposit. after that select TRX (TRC20) and choose how much you want to invest. (minimum deposit 10 trx. Commission 2% ) Trx amount will be transferred to your balance after saving

about.40: For example, an invitee named A receives B and A receives 10% of B's ​​deposit. If B goes and invites C, this time A gets 5% of C's investment. If person C invites person D, this time person A wins 3% of the investment amount.

about.51: ABOUT TRON GENESIS MINING CLOUD COMPANY
about.52: Tron Genesis Mining Cloud company is Tron mining company which was established on 05.10.2021 in Sweden. Our company's goal is to minimize the Gwei fee on the Tron blockchain. We are working hard for this. In short, TRONGMC company is signing a brand new plan!. We are here with our company's online cloud platform on 20.07.2023. Our company's purpose is for people to rent machinery for Mining Online and support the Tron blockchain. With this, Gwei will minimize fees and create a faster blockchain with less fees! In this, the machines you rent will provide you with additional income. For example, when you buy Vip1, the special software will be preparing the X brand machine in our company for your system. So you will be able to mine online with Cloud Mining. We have made promotional rewards more profitable for you. so by bringing more customers to our company, you will support us and yourself. You can profit by trusting yourself and us, and you can start with the VIP packages offered by our company. You can develop your own online marketing network. Our company will always be updated with innovations. You can review the Roadmap we offer on our site.
